parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Oil Sludge Build-up and Excessive Oil Consumption
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The build-up of oil sludge in the engine can cause excessive oil consumption, engine seizure, and even engine fire, which can lead to accidents, vehicle damage, and costly repairs.
symptoms: Excessive oil consumption
white smoke on start-up
blue exhaust smoke
check engine light illumination
gelled oil or sludge present beneath the oil filler cap on the valve cover
engine seizure
and engine fire.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The airbag's oversensitivity can lead to unnecessary deployments, which can cause injuries or fatalities, especially to vulnerable occupants such as infants.
symptoms: Airbags deploy in minor accidents
airbags deploy unnecessarily
airbags cause fatal injuries to occupants.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of airbags to deploy in severe accidents can lead to serious injuries or fatalities, as occupants are left without the necessary protection.
symptoms: Airbags do not deploy in accidents
airbags fail to deploy despite severe impact
occupants suffer injuries due to lack of airbag deployment.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Rack and Pinion Steering Unit Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rack and pinion steering unit can cause loss of control, making it difficult to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: The steering wheel becomes difficult to turn
the steering feels loose or sloppy
the vehicle wanders or drifts while driving
unusual noises come from the steering column
the vehicle is hard to control while turning
the steering wheel locks up.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering pump can cause the steering system to malfunction, making it difficult to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: The steering feels heavy or difficult to turn
the steering pump makes unusual noises
the steering system becomes hot
the power steering fluid leaks
the vehicle is hard to control while turning.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Electrical System Failure leading to Vehicle Fire
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause a vehicle fire, even when the vehicle is turned off and parked, which can lead to property damage, injury, or loss of life.
symptoms: The vehicle catches fire
even when parked and turned off
with no warning signs
such as smoke or noise
before the explosion.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the instrument cluster panel can cause the dashboard to malfunction, making it difficult or impossible to access important information, such as speed and warning lights, which can lead to accidents or other safety issues.
symptoms: The dashboard panel fails
making it impossible to see any information
and the vehicle's instruments and warning lights do not function.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Battery Failure leading to Explosion or Fire
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the battery can cause an explosion or fire, even when the vehicle is turned off, which can lead to property damage, injury, or loss of life.
symptoms: The battery explodes or catches fire
even when the vehicle is turned off
and the vehicle cannot be turned off except by disconnecting the negative terminal on the battery.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause the vehicle to lose control, making it difficult to steer, which can lead to accidents or loss of vehicle control.
symptoms: The wheel is hard to turn
the vehicle shimmies or vibrates
the steering column or entire vehicle vibrates
the power steering pump is leaking
the power steering rack is broken.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the shock absorbers can cause the vehicle to lose control, making it difficult to steer, which can lead to accidents or loss of vehicle control.
symptoms: The shocks are too soft
the shocks have failed
the vehicle shimmies or vibrates.
